lines.text: God but you're a real dame... right straight through to the core. You shouldn't have to live in the same world with a thing like me.
You keep away from him! Youre hired as freaks... not vampires!
Now, folks, on the inside... "The Show" starts immediately!
Salome, thou art a wicked woman.
I just gave back a present he gave me once
If it's his heart you want I'll cut it out and give it to you!
Has that Butter Ball of mine from the country been around tonight?
Is it all right for me to come in here... when we're not married?
Robin, you'll always love me, won't you?
With hills full of sheep... Lena, how could you ask me?
She's got the police after me! That's what happens for being nice to women!
They say she kept him in her room... alone... for weeks.
